pkgmetadata.longdescription: # New Zealand Business NumberA Python library for interacting with New Zealand Business Number services.## Installation```$ pip install nzbn```## Example Usage### Get a list of abbreviated entities```pythonfrom nzbn import AbbreviatedEntityentities: List[AbbreciatedEntity] = AbbreviatedEntity.retrieve_many( access_token="your nzbn API access token", search_text="some entity name", page=0, # defaults to 0 limit=20 # per page count, defaults to 20)```### Get detailed data about an entity```pythonfrom nzbn import Entityentity: Entity = Entity.retrieve( access_token="your nzbn API access token", nzbn="9429049541410", sandbox=False # defaults to False)```
